verses.roman:
dodhūyamānāṁ tāṁ nāvaṁ
samīreṇa balīyasā
upasthitasya me śṛṅge
nibadhnīhi mahāhinā

synonyms: dodhūyamānām—being tossed about; tām—that; nāvam—boat; samīreṇa—by the wind; balīyasā—very powerful; upasthitasya—situated nearby; me—of Me; śṛṅge—to the horn; nibadhnīhi—bind; mahā-ahinā—by the large serpent (Vāsuki).
translation: Then, as the boat is tossed about by the powerful winds, attach the vessel to My horn by means of the great serpent Vāsuki, for I shall be present by your side.
